statements: SELECT * FROM ad_creatives WHERE campaign_id = 10;
SELECT id, creative_name, click_through_rate FROM ad_creatives WHERE conversions > 100;
SELECT creative_name, conversions FROM ad_creatives ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT id, creative_name FROM ad_creatives WHERE click_through_rate < 0.02;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives WHERE conversions > 100 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT id, creative_name FROM ad_creatives WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY creative_name ASC;
SELECT creative_name, conversions, click_through_rate FROM ad_creatives WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT id, campaign_id FROM ad_creatives WHERE conversions < 50 AND click_through_rate < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives;
SELECT ad_name, ad_description FROM ad_creatives;
SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM ad_creatives WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, conversion_rate FROM ad_creatives ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ad_creatives WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT ad_name, conversion_rate FROM ad_creatives WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 0.02 AND 0.1 ORDER BY ad_name ASC;
SELECT id, ad_name, ad_description, CONCAT('CTR:', click_through_rate * 100, '%') AS formatted_ctr FROM ad_creatives WHERE click_through_rate IS NOT NULL AND conversion_rate IS NOT NULL;
SELECT test_id, test_date, clicks, conversions FROM test_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT creative_id, creative_type, created_date FROM ad_creatives WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT creative_id, campaign_id, creative_type, created_date FROM ad_creatives WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT metric_id, creative_id, clicks, conversions, ctr FROM ad_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT * FROM ads;
SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ads WHERE conversions > 100;
SELECT ad_name, ad_creative, click_through_rate FROM ads ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT group_name, ad_type FROM ad_groups WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, country_code FROM users WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM ads ORDER BY ad_name DESC;
SELECT id, ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ads WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 AND conversions > 10 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT ad_name, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr FROM ads GROUP BY ad_name HAVING AVG(click_through_rate) > 0.3;
SELECT group_name, COUNT(*) AS ad_count FROM ad_groups GROUP BY group_name ORDER BY ad_count DESC;
SELECT ad_group_id, experiment_name FROM experiments WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT ad_group_id, ad_group_name FROM ad_groups;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, status FROM ads WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT click_id, click_timestamp FROM clicks WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC;
SELECT conversion_id, conversion_type, conversion_value FROM conversions WHERE conversion_type = 'purchase';
SELECT ad_group_id, ad_group_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_groups;
SELECT ad_group_id, ad_group_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_groups WHERE ad_group_id = 1;
SELECT ad_group_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_groups ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad.ad_name, ad.ad_creative, ads.status, ad_groups.ad_group_name FROM ads JOIN ad_groups ON ads.ad_group_id = ad_groups.ad_group_id;
SELECT DISTINCT ad_group_name, COUNT(ad_id) AS total_ads FROM ad_groups JOIN ads ON ad_groups.ad_group_id = ads.ad_group_id GROUP BY ad_group_name ORDER BY total_ads DESC;
